title: How to get the name of a song that's stuck in your head - Quora

response.answer_text: I use the lyrics to guess the name of the song. Most choruses have the name of the song in it. Like the song Goodbye by Jason derulo and Nicki Minaj. Now just check out the lyrics…. “It's time to say goodbye but don't leave me alone , just stay for the night. I need you ×2 tonight Baby you know that its time to say goodbye but don't leave me alone just stay for the night……” So when I googled the song my first guess was its time to say goodbye. So I searched “ its time to say goodbye song .” and google told me the real name of the song and the artist. You can also download an app called Shazam. The next time you here the song you can use that app to listen to the song offline and once you go online the app will tell you the name if the song. I hope what I've told you helps

Let me hear the tune of the song..hum the song in front of others. if you know any words from the song let me know i will try to help you. If you know the year song released do a google search and listen to all hit songs released in that year. Keep trying and chances are there that your memory will present it in full form or give a clue.
